text:
1/2

Gwyneth Paltrow found Halloween inspiration in her 1995 movie "Seven." File Photo by John Angelillo/UPI | License Photo

Oct. 29 (UPI) -- Actress Gwyneth Paltrow shared on Instagram Sunday a photo of her and her boyfriend Brad Falchuk in their Halloween costumes. The image recalled her 1995 thriller Seven, showing Paltrow's head in a cardboard box and Falchuk dressed as Kevin Spacey's serial killer John Doe, the man responsible for Paltrow's character Tracy's decapitation. Advertisement

Paltrow and Spacey co-starred in the film with Morgan Freeman and Paltrow's ex-fiance Brad Pitt.
title: Gwyneth Paltrow reprises her infamous 'Seven' role for Halloween costume
